reason: The confluence of significant institutional adoption (Visa stablecoin payouts, Bankinter investment in Bit2Me) and direct capital inflow into U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs ($750M in one day, strongest since October) signals a strong demand-driven Markup phase. Increased accessibility to leveraged trading on Binance, while adding to market volatility, suggests growing market participation. The Dogecoin jump indicates broader market risk appetite. While the market is experiencing strong positive momentum, the inherent volatility of crypto assets, especially with increased leverage, keeps the risk score elevated. Immediate price action is likely to be upward, forming new higher support levels.
headlines: Binance Wallet unlocks in-app leveraged crypto futures trading with Aster team-up
Visa teams up with BVNK to launch stablecoin payouts
Spanish bank Bankinter joins BBVA and Tether with stake in crypto exchange Bit2Me
U.S. spot bitcoin ETFs pull in $750 million in strongest day since October
Dogecoin jumps nearly 9% as buyers push price out of recent downtrend
